subject: Re: [junit] ClassCastException with dom4j
msgSnippet: ... Which class is not loading? Do you have any entry in excluded.properties for /that/ class or package? It s not clear from your message that you ve done
messageBody:
jewellgm wrote:
> Hi All,
>
> I seem to be having a classloader problem. I've checked the FAQ and
> saw the entry about having org.w3c.dom.* and org.xml.sax.* in the
> excluded.properties file. I'm using junit 3.8.1, so these entries
> already exist.

Which class is not loading? Do you have any entry in excluded.properties
for /that/ class or package? It's not clear from your message that
you've done that.
